overall_assessment.reasoning: Strong PRD generated from well-structured Jira ticket. Clear problem definition and user segments. Some assumptions made around competitive positioning and impact estimates that need validation.

section_assessments.action_taken: Populated directly from Jira metadata including title, creator, status, and stakeholders
section_assessments.reasoning: Direct 1:1 mapping from Jira fields, no interpretation required

section_assessments.action_taken: Synthesized business problem from Jira description and acceptance criteria
section_assessments.reasoning: Clear problem statement in ticket, added competitive context based on industry knowledge

section_assessments.action_taken: Defined 3 user segments based on Jira description mentions
section_assessments.reasoning: User segments inferred from description, constraints assumed based on e-commerce patterns
section_assessments.review_focus: Confirm user segment priorities and constraints

section_assessments.action_taken: Extracted goals from Jira and added quantified success criteria
section_assessments.reasoning: Goals aligned with ticket intent, impact estimates (15% lift) based on benchmarks not ticket data
section_assessments.review_focus: Validate business impact estimates with analytics team

section_assessments.action_taken: In-scope populated from acceptance criteria, out-of-scope marked TBD
section_assessments.reasoning: Acceptance criteria clearly listed in-scope items, boundaries well-defined

section_assessments.action_taken: Left as TBD for Design/UX agent
section_assessments.reasoning: Correctly preserved placeholder per agent boundaries

section_assessments.action_taken: Defined KPI framework with metric types, left specific targets for validation
section_assessments.reasoning: Metrics aligned with goals, targets estimated from industry benchmarks
section_assessments.review_focus: Confirm baseline metrics and target values with analytics

section_assessments.action_taken: Left as TBD for Analytics agent
section_assessments.reasoning: Correctly preserved placeholder per agent boundaries
Standard e-commerce risks identified, may miss domain-specific concerns
section_assessments.review_focus: Product lead should add domain-specific risks

section_assessments.reasoning: Basic structure only, detailed planning deferred to Rollout PM agent
section_assessments.review_focus: Rollout PM agent will expand this section

section_assessments.action_taken: Defined standard monitoring and iteration approach
section_assessments.reasoning: Standard practices defined, specific thresholds need validation

section_assessments.action_taken: Surfaced 6 genuine ambiguities from ticket analysis
section_assessments.reasoning: Questions directly derived from gaps in ticket information
section_assessments.review_focus: Schedule stakeholder session to resolve questions

data_sources_used.reasoning: Well-structured ticket with clear description, acceptance criteria, and linked documents
General e-commerce conversion benchmarks applied, not company-specific data

decisions_made.decision: Prioritized mobile web over native app based on traffic split
decisions_made.reasoning: Ticket mentions 68% mobile web traffic, implies mobile-first approach
decisions_made.validation_needed: Confirm traffic split data with analytics team

decisions_made.decision: Set 15% activation rate improvement as target
decisions_made.reasoning: Based on similar feature launches in e-commerce, not company-specific data
decisions_made.validation_needed: Review historical feature impact data to calibrate target

decisions_made.decision: Defined 3 user segments instead of 2 or 4
decisions_made.reasoning: Ticket explicitly mentions first-time visitors and returning users, added manufacturers based on description context
decisions_made.validation_needed: Validate segment definitions with product marketing

assumptions_made.assumption: Users prefer social proof (reviews, ratings) on homepage
assumptions_made.reasoning: Standard e-commerce best practice, not explicitly stated in ticket
assumptions_made.risk_if_wrong: May over-invest in social proof features users don't value
assumptions_made.validation_needed: User research or A/B test to confirm

assumptions_made.assumption: Page load time under 3 seconds is acceptable threshold
assumptions_made.reasoning: Industry standard, not explicitly stated in ticket
assumptions_made.risk_if_wrong: May set too lenient or strict performance targets

assumptions_made.assumption: Registration flow will use existing auth system
assumptions_made.reasoning: Ticket doesn't mention new auth work
assumptions_made.risk_if_wrong: May underestimate engineering effort if new auth needed

quality_checks_performed.details: Problem framed around user conversion and experience
3 segments with distinct characteristics and constraints
Design and Analytics sections empty per boundaries
Each section has clear next steps
All 12 sections present in correct order

quality_checks_performed.check: Claims backed by data or marked assumptions
quality_checks_performed.details: 3 assumptions not explicitly labeled in PRD text, added to this audit

score_improvement_recommendations.recommendation: Add validated user research data to support segment definitions
score_improvement_recommendations.implementation: Conduct 3 user interviews per segment or pull existing persona research

score_improvement_recommendations.recommendation: Replace benchmark estimates with company-specific historical data
score_improvement_recommendations.implementation: Pull conversion data from last 3 feature launches for realistic targets

score_improvement_recommendations.recommendation: Add domain-specific risks from subject matter experts
score_improvement_recommendations.implementation: 30-minute session with product lead and tech lead to identify blind spots

score_improvement_recommendations.recommendation: Include VOC analysis to ground PRD in customer evidence
score_improvement_recommendations.implementation: Run VOC Analysis Agent for related customer feedback themes

recommended_review_sequence.focus: Validate business framing, user segments, and goal alignment
Confirm baseline data availability and target realism
Validate technical feasibility and identify technical risks
